title: Clarrie's Ranch

abstract: Drop in on a town legend and his self-made tourist attraction. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Horsham Shire'.
description: Clarence ‘Clarrie’ Mackley has built his own patch of paradise, a small ranch devoted to Slim Dusty, Elvis and all things country and western. Living by his ethos of 'do what you wanna do', Mackley attracts tourists from all over to the world to his colourful place in Horsham, western Victoria.
